item.title: RDS
item.description: About Relational Database Service Managed DB service that uses SQL as query language Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) is a collection of managed services that makes it simple to set up, operate, and scale databases in the cloud. Documentation User Guide Supports engines: Amazon Aurora with MySQL compatibility: 5432 Amazon Aurora with PostgreSQL compatibility: 5432 MySQL: 3306 MariaDB: 3306 PostgreSQL: 5432 Oracle: 1521 SQL Server: 1433 Engine modes: Used in CreateDBCluster global parallelquery serverless multimaster Backups Backups are enabled by default in RDS Automated backups
